name: 高級寫作（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENU0287  中級寫作（一）】、【ENU0288  中級寫作（二）】、【ENU0289  高級寫作（一）】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: To help students rehearse skills in various modes of writing
Help students build a good sense of the difference between smart, sophisticated, quality writing and bland, hackneyed writing
Students are expected to integrate writing techniques with their knowledge of the topic/subject
syllabus:
This course has 16 weeks of lectures and 2 weeks of self-learning.

**Course Description:**  
The second half of this one-year course is designed to continue expanding and strengthening students’ ability to read, reflect, and write critically about cultural texts. In addition, students will have opportunities to develop writing skills useful for future application for jobs or further studies. As an extension of the Fall session, students will be given different writing scenarios to apply their writing skills and strategies.   
  
 

**Analysis of the Final Grade:**

The final course grade will be based on:

*   Attendance and Participation (in-class activities)   20%
*   Projects and essays 50%
    *   First drafts 25%
    *   Revisions 25%
*   Presentations (show, fair, exhibition) 30%
